title: The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle – 36 Count Tea Bags Each
descriptions:
Indulge in the cozy flavors of fall with The Republic of Tea's Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas bundle! This delightful set includes 36 count tea bags each of Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea. 

The Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea is a caffeine-free blend bursting with the essence of apple cider, cinnamon, and cloves. Made with premium ingredients like apple pieces, orange peel, and ginger root, this tea will warm you up from the inside out.

On the other hand, the Caramel Apple Herbal Tea offers a sweet and creamy experience with notes of vanilla and South African Rooibos. It's the perfect way to unwind and treat yourself during the autumn season.

Simply steep in boiling water for 5-7 minutes and enjoy the comforting aroma that fills the room. Plus, when you're done, don't forget to recycle the used tea bags by adding them to your compost or soil.

This Herbal Tea Bundle is ideal for those looking to embrace the flavors of fall and enjoy a dessert-like tea experience. Treat yourself to the taste of the season with The Republic of Tea's Fall Apple Teas!

For a sweet treat, try the Caramel Apple Herbal Tea. This caffeine-free blend features the flavors of sweet apples, vanilla, and South African Rooibos. It's like enjoying a delicious caramel apple in a cup!

With easy steeping instructions and the option to compost used tea bags, this bundle is not only delicious but also environmentally friendly. Perfect for savoring during the harvest season or as a dessert tea, The Republic of Tea Fall Apple Teas will become your new favorite autumn indulgence. Get yours today!
